pages.text: While the $(item)Amulet of Wrath$() is a useful combat tool, it does require one to actively participate in combat. For the lazy botanist there is the $(item)Auto Wrath$(), which allows them to kill their enemies while spending their time in a more useful manner. This does however come at a cost, this apparatus requires $(aura) from the Nether realm to function.

This can be provided by placing it in an area where this kind of $(aura) is prevalent. It can also be provided by putting bottles of $(aura) in a container atop the device. Furthermore $(aura) of any kind is consumed for each enemy that is damaged.
Creating the $(item)Auto Wrath$() using the $(l:practices/tree_ritual)Ritual of the Forest$()
